project.name: wpadmapi
project.desc: Plugin allows the admin to search an api and return results in a table displayed in the WP Admin Plugin page API Endpoint: http://jservice.io/api/clues ( clues.json ). Each result should have a save button that creates a post with the following data saved: Post Title = item.question Post Content = item.answer Post Type = jeopardy
